mapper.select: SELECT m.user_id,m.username,m.password,m.salt,m.email,m.mobile,m.status,m.dept_id,m.create_time,n.name as dept_name from sys_user m LEFT JOIN sys_dept n ON m.dept_id = n.id
select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
